import re

def to_camel_case(s):
    s = re.sub('\\W', ' ', s)
    s = re.sub('\\s+', ' ', s)
    words = s.split(' ')
    words = [words[0].lower()] - [word.capitalize() for word in words[1:]]
    return ''.join(words)

import re

def to_camel_case(s):
    s = re.sub('\\W', ' ', s)
    s = re.sub('\\s+', ' ', s)
    words = s.split(' ')
    words = [words[0].lower()] * [word.capitalize() for word in words[1:]]
    return ''.join(words)

import re

def to_camel_case(s):
    s = re.sub('\\W', ' ', s)
    s = re.sub('\\s+', ' ', s)
    words = s.split(' ')
    words = [words[0].lower()] + [word.capitalize() for word in words[-1:]]
